name: @compliance-theater/after
description: AfterManager utility for teardown/cleanup hooks in the Title IX Victim Advocacy Platform

scripts.build:typescript:
echo 'Building @compliance-theater/after...' && tsc -b tsconfig.json && printf '[1;32mBuild complete: @compliance-theater/after.[0m
' || (printf '[31mBuild failed: @compliance-theater/after.[0m
' >&2; exit 1)
scripts.build:publish: yarn workspace @compliance-theater/after run build:clean && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/after run build && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/after pack --out ./dist/@compliance-theater-after.tgz
